alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 6:28AM EDT until July 17 at 6:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River At Brookfield. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 7.9 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.6 feet on 10/15/2005. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Mon 5 am: 13.5 Forecast: Mon 12 pm 12.3 Mon 6 pm 9.9 Tue 12 am 8.4 Tue 6 am 7.9 &&
